id.description: The unique id associated with a report at the backend.

companyId.description: The companyId used while registering the customer.

name.description: The name of the customer, as used during registration.

data.description: The data last pushed by customer along with annotations.

lastPushDate.description: The date when the report data was last pushed by the customer.

lastUpdateMadeBy.description: The name of the person who last pushed the data. Maintained for identification purposes.
